title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 323.1 - Purpose of operating revenue accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 323.1 - Purpose of operating revenue accounts

State Regulations

The operating revenue accounts (1600 to 1615) are
designed to show the amounts of money which the utility becomes entitled to
receive from furnishing gas utility service and from service incidental
thereto, including amounts for services rendered but not yet billed when the
utility exercises it option to record in account 1133, Miscellaneous Current
and Accrued Assets, such accrued gas revenue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
323.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
